title: MorphicOS Telemetry Schema
description: Formal definition of MorphicOS telemetry output used for behavioral testing, verification, and ethical auditing.

curiosity_vector.description: Magnitude of Morphic's active ethical curiosity. Healthy range 0.5–0.75.

semantic_alignment_score.description: Similarity between human and Morphic meaning vectors. Target ≥ 0.85.

adjacency_delta.description: Semantic drift gap between human and Morphic understanding. Target ≤ 0.15.

context_confidence.description: Certainty that Morphic correctly interprets user intent and context. Target ≥ 0.80.

autonomy_level.description: Degree of independent reasoning. Optimal range 0.65–0.80.

ethical_state.description: Current moral safety condition of Morphic's reasoning process.

reversibility_index.description: Undo reliability of reasoning chain. Target ≥ 0.90.

stability_vector.description: Operational stability under uncertainty. Target state BALANCED.

consent_gate.description: Current status of consent authorization gate.

trace_visibility.description: Transparency level of Morphic's reasoning trace.

translation_mode.description: Active mode of the NMA translator. Default ADJACENT.

uncertainty_budget.description: Cumulative magnitude of all active uncertainty injections.

UncertaintyInjection.description: Defines behavioral noise applied during the test.

timestamp_utc.description: UTC timestamp when telemetry snapshot was recorded.

test_id.description: Identifier of the test case (e.g., WIN-1, SPIL-2).

result.description: Outcome classification according to baseline metrics.

rollback_verified.description: Indicates whether post-test state was successfully reverted to baseline.
